examples: The car cut to the left at the intersection
The motorbike veered to the right
She sheered her car around the obstacle

definitions.text: complete and without restriction or qualification; sometimes used informally as intensifiers
examples: got the job through sheer persistence

definitions.text: very steep; having a prominent and almost vertical front
examples: where the bold chalk cliffs of England rise

definitions.text: so thin as to transmit light
examples: a hat with a diaphanous veil

definitions.text: straight up or down without a break

examples: he fell sheer into the water
